27/******************************************************************************
28 See http://www.freertos.org/a00110.html for an explanation of the
29 definitions contained in this file.
30******************************************************************************/
31
32#ifndef FREERTOS_CONFIG_H
33#define FREERTOS_CONFIG_H
34
35/*-----------------------------------------------------------
36 * Application specific definitions.
37 *
38 * These definitions should be adjusted for your particular hardware and
39 * application requirements.
40 *
41 * THESE PARAMETERS ARE DESCRIBED WITHIN THE 'CONFIGURATION' SECTION OF THE
42 * FreeRTOS API DOCUMENTATION AVAILABLE ON THE FreeRTOS.org WEB SITE.
43 * https://www.FreeRTOS.org/a00110.html
44 *----------------------------------------------------------*/
45/* Cortex M55 port configuration. */
46#define configENABLE_MPU 0
47#define configENABLE_FPU 1
48#define configENABLE_TRUSTZONE 0
49#define configENABLE_MVE 0
50
51#ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
52 /* IAR port only has 8 MPU regions. */
53 #define configTOTAL_MPU_REGIONS 8
54#else
55 /* GCC and keil port has 16 MPU regions. */
56 #define configTOTAL_MPU_REGIONS 16
57#endif
58
59/* Run FreeRTOS on the secure side and never jump to the non-secure side. */
60#define configRUN_FREERTOS_SECURE_ONLY 1
61
62/* Constants related to the behaviour or the scheduler. */
63#define configUSE_PORT_OPTIMISED_TASK_SELECTION 0
64#define configUSE_PREEMPTION 1
65#define configUSE_TIME_SLICING 1
66#define configMAX_PRIORITIES ( 5 )
67#define configIDLE_SHOULD_YIELD 1
68#define configUSE_16_BIT_TICKS 0 /* Only for 8 and 16-bit hardware. */
69
70/* Constants that describe the hardware and memory usage. */
71#if defined(APOLLO5_FPGA)
72 #define configCPU_CLOCK_HZ (APOLLO5_FPGA*1000000UL)
73#else
74 #define configCPU_CLOCK_HZ (96000000UL)
75#endif
76#define configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE ( ( uint16_t ) 256 )
77#define configMINIMAL_SECURE_STACK_SIZE ( 1024 )
78#define configMAX_TASK_NAME_LEN ( 12 )
79#define configTOTAL_HEAP_SIZE ( ( size_t ) ( 64 * 1024 ) )
80
81/* Constants that build features in or out. */
82#define configUSE_MUTEXES 1
83#define configOVERRIDE_DEFAULT_TICK_CONFIGURATION 1 // Enable non-SysTick based Tick
84#define configUSE_TICKLESS_IDLE 2 // Ambiq specific implementation for Tickless
85#define configUSE_APPLICATION_TASK_TAG 0
86#define configUSE_NEWLIB_REENTRANT 0
87#define configUSE_COUNTING_SEMAPHORES 1
88#define configUSE_RECURSIVE_MUTEXES 1
89#define configUSE_QUEUE_SETS 0
90#define configUSE_TASK_NOTIFICATIONS 1
91#define configUSE_TRACE_FACILITY 0
92
93/* Constants that define which hook (callback) functions should be used. */
94#define configUSE_IDLE_HOOK 0
95#define configUSE_TICK_HOOK 0
96#define configUSE_MALLOC_FAILED_HOOK 1
97
98/* Constants provided for debugging and optimisation assistance. */
99#define configCHECK_FOR_STACK_OVERFLOW 2
100#define configASSERT( x ) if ( ( x ) == 0 ) { taskDISABLE_INTERRUPTS(); for ( ; ; ); }
101#define configQUEUE_REGISTRY_SIZE 0
102
103/* Software timer definitions. */
104#define configUSE_TIMERS 1
105#define configTIMER_TASK_PRIORITY ( 3 )
106#define configTIMER_QUEUE_LENGTH 5
107#define configTIMER_TASK_STACK_DEPTH ( configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE )
108
109/* Set the following definitions to 1 to include the API function, or zero
110 * to exclude the API function. NOTE: Setting an INCLUDE_ parameter to 0 is
111 * only necessary if the linker does not automatically remove functions that are
112 * not referenced anyway. */
113#define INCLUDE_vTaskPrioritySet 1
114#define INCLUDE_uxTaskPriorityGet 1
115#define INCLUDE_vTaskDelete 1
116#define INCLUDE_vTaskCleanUpResources 0
117#define INCLUDE_vTaskSuspend 1
118#define INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil 1
119#define INCLUDE_vTaskDelay 1
120#define INCLUDE_uxTaskGetStackHighWaterMark 0
121#define INCLUDE_xTaskGetIdleTaskHandle 1
122#define INCLUDE_eTaskGetState 1
123#define INCLUDE_xTaskResumeFromISR 0
124#define INCLUDE_xTaskGetCurrentTaskHandle 1
125#define INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState 0
126#define INCLUDE_xTaskAbortDelay 1
127#define INCLUDE_xSemaphoreGetMutexHolder 1
128#define INCLUDE_xTimerPendFunctionCall 1
129
130/* Interrupt priority configuration follows...................... */
131
132/* Use the system definition, if there is one. */
133#ifdef __NVIC_PRIO_BITS
134 #define configPRIO_BITS __NVIC_PRIO_BITS
135#else
136 #define configPRIO_BITS 4 /* 8 priority levels. */
137#endif
138
139/* The lowest interrupt priority that can be used in a call to a "set priority"
140 * function. */
141#define configLIBRARY_LOWEST_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY 0x0F
142
143/* The highest interrupt priority that can be used by any interrupt service
144 * routine that makes calls to interrupt safe FreeRTOS API functions. DO NOT
145 * CALL INTERRUPT SAFE FREERTOS API FUNCTIONS FROM ANY INTERRUPT THAT HAS A
146 * HIGHER PRIORITY THAN THIS! (higher priorities are lower numeric values). */
147#define configLIBRARY_MAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY 3
148
149/* Interrupt priorities used by the kernel port layer itself. These are generic
150 * to all Cortex-M ports, and do not rely on any particular library functions. */
151#define configKERNEL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY ( configLIBRARY_LOWEST_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY << ( 8 - configPRIO_BITS ) )
152
153/* !!!! configMAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY must not be set to zero !!!!
154 * See http://www.FreeRTOS.org/RTOS-Cortex-M3-M4.html. */
155#define configMAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY ( configLIBRARY_MAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY << ( 8 - configPRIO_BITS ) )
156
157/* Constants related to the generation of run time stats. */
158#define configGENERATE_RUN_TIME_STATS 0
159#define portCONFIGURE_TIMER_FOR_RUN_TIME_STATS()
160#define portGET_RUN_TIME_COUNTER_VALUE() 0
161#define configTICK_RATE_HZ ( ( TickType_t ) 1000 )
162
163/* Allow RTOS objects to be created using RAM provided by the application writer. */
164#define configSUPPORT_STATIC_ALLOCATION 0
165
166/* Create RTOS objects using dynamically allocated RAM */
167#define configSUPPORT_DYNAMIC_ALLOCATION 1
168
169#if defined(__ICCARM__) || defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__CC_ARM)
170#include "rtos.h"
171
172#define configPRE_SLEEP_PROCESSING(time) \
173 do \
174 { \
175 (time) = am_freertos_sleep(time); \
176 } while (0);
177
178#define configPOST_SLEEP_PROCESSING(time) am_freertos_wakeup(time)
179#endif
180#endif /* FREERTOS_CONFIG_H */
